channel.title: Need multiple downloads (This will be a big list)
channel.description:
[center][b]So, as my life goes, I get a few weeks to a few months on, and usually 8 months off. (Talking about internet) I'm wanting to get a whole package of sources/clients, I just think I'll find it useful
[size=10pt]Here's the list (I'll be updating frequently)[/size]
Hybris - https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,542788.0.html Prototype - http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,560754.0.html ScratchPI by C++ Imbued - http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,530052.msg3869532.html#msg3869532 OptimusScape - http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,544399.msg3990488.html#msg3990488 Jinsanity - http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,510646.msg3705531.html#msg3705531 Deathlypvpz V4 - http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,633225.msg4278695.html#msg4278695 [/b][/center]
